description:
Gokudera and Ryohei are separated from Yamamoto and Lal Mirch. Lal has passed out from her battle with Ginger and isn`t regaining consciousness. Yamamoto roams through the base carrying Lal. He wanders into a cramped area filled with pipes. Suddenly, a boomerang surrounded with deathperations flames comes at Yamamoto! Waiting for him is an assassin placed there by Irie. The boomerang relentlessly attacks him from all directions. Yamamoto cannot use his special attack in this cramped space. Yamamoto is cornered, but he thinks up a plan…
Source: crunchyroll
